General.Name: King-Strong New Material Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Kingstrong Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the new material industry in China. It offers power amplifier and filter modules; launch components; power add-ons; frequency hopping filter components; TR components; switch co-site filtering components; and solid-state transmitters. The company also provides thermal barrier coatings, carbon fiber products, absorbing materials, and photelectric products. Its products are used in various applications, such as communication, radar, interference, measurement and control, aviation, aerospace, and other high-end fields. The company was formerly known as King-Strong New Material Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Kingstrong Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2021. Guangdong Kingstrong Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
